item.title: CVE-2024-29794|2024-03-27T12:40:18.533Z -- Conversios -- Conversios.io
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Conversios Conversios.Io allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Conversios.Io: from n/a through 6.9.1.
